snippet: Senior aides say that the push is not an attack on Mitt Romney’s wealth, but part of a broader plan to disqualify his economic credentials in the eyes of voters.
abstract: Pres Obama's campaign is accusing Mitt Romney of hiding the sources of his multimillion-dollar fortune and of refusing to release multiple years of his tax returns; Obama's senior aides say that the push is not an attack on Romney's wealth, but a part of a broader plan to disqualify his economic credentials in the eyes of voters.
lead_paragraph: Senior aides say that the push is not an attack on Mitt Romney’s wealth, but part of a broader plan to disqualify his economic credentials in the eyes of voters.

headline.seo: Obama Camp Pushes Romney to Disclose Finances
headline.main: Obama’s Camp Makes Aggressive Push for Romney to Disclose Offshore Finances
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Camp Makes Aggressive Push for Romney to Disclose Offshore Finances
